resources.string:
Welcome to LevaLens! This application uses advanced image processing technology to help you identify Bulgarian banknotes quickly and easily.üîç

 How to Use:
 1. Point your camera at the banknote you want to identify.
 2. Press the capture button or one of the volume buttons to take a picture.
 3. The app will analyze the picture and read the result aloud.

 Important Note:
 Please be aware that this app is part of an ongoing research project. While we strive for accuracy, the results may not always be 100% precise.

 Thank you for using our app! üòä

1. Acceptance of Terms

By downloading or using LevaLens, these terms will automatically apply to you ‚Äì you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app. The developer is offering you LevaLens to use for your own personal use without cost, but you should be aware that you cannot send it on to anyone else, and you‚Äôre not allowed to copy, or modify the app, any part of the app, or our trademarks in any way.

2. Use of LevaLens

LevaLens is a tool designed to identify Bulgarian banknotes. While we strive to provide accurate results, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or correctness of the predictions. The app is not a substitute for professional advice or services.

3. Disclaimer of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event will the owners, be liable for any indirect, punitive, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including without limitation damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, that result from the use of, or inability to use, this service.

4. Privacy Policy

LevaLens is designed to respect your privacy. The app does not collect, store, or share any personal data. All image processing is done locally on your device.

5. Changes to These Terms

We reserve the right to update these Terms of Use at any time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of these Terms.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at levalens@gmail.com."
This app requires camera permission to function correctly. Please enable it in the app settings.
Your phone vibrates on silent mode in correlation with banknote value. Higher value, more vibrations (e.g., 5 Lev = 1 vibration, 10 Lev = 2 vibrations, etc.).
Automatically enable torch when the app starts. Torch will be turned off when you exit the application.
